incidents.title: Temporary API Latency
incidents.description: Increased latency observed on Dashboard API endpoints due to high load. Issue mitigated within 20 minutes.

incidents.title: Database Connection Warnings
incidents.description: Some intermittent database timeouts were detected. Engineers are monitoring connection stability.

incidents.title: CDN Slow Response
incidents.description: Reports of slow image loading via Discord CDN are being investigated by upstream providers.
